trans-unit.source: Affectors
trans-unit.target: Affectors

trans-unit.source: Affectors are an optional component of a particle system. They can perform a variety of manipulations to the simulation, such as altering the trajectory of particles or prematurely ending their life in the simulation. For performance reasons, it is recommended not to use Affectors in high-volume particle systems.
trans-unit.target: Affectors是粒子系统的一个可选组件。它们可以对模拟进行各种操作,例如改变粒子的轨迹或提前结束它们在模拟中的寿命。出于性能方面的考虑,建议不要在大批量的粒子系统中使用Affectors。

trans-unit.source: Affectors have different performance characteristics to the other particle system elements. In particular, they have some simplifications to try to maintain a simulation at real-time or faster. When running a system with Affectors, irregular frame timings that grow too large ( > one second per frame) will cause the Affectors to try and cut corners with a faster but less accurate simulation. If the system has multiple affectors the order in which they are applied is not guaranteed, and when simulating larger time shifts they will simulate the whole shift each, which can lead to different results compared to smaller time shifts.
trans-unit.target: 影响器与其他粒子系统元素具有不同的性能特征。特别是，它们具有一些简化，可以尝试实时或更快地维持仿真。当运行带有Affector的系统时，不规则的帧时序会变得太大（每帧>一秒），这将导致Affector尝试通过更快但不太准确的模拟来偷工减料。如果系统具有多个影响器，则不能保证应用它们的顺序，并且在模拟较大的时移时，它们将分别模拟整个时移，与较小的时移相比，可能会导致不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: Affectors, particularly if modifying the particles in javascript, can be relatively slow as well as increasing the CPU cost of using particles. Avoid using them in high-volume systems where possible. Some easy cases where Affectors can be avoided are using timed ParticleGroup transitions instead of time-triggered Affectors, or setting acceleration due to gravity in the acceleration property of the Emitter instead of with a Gravity Affector.
trans-unit.target: 事务，尤其是在javascript中修改粒子时，可能相对较慢，并且会增加使用粒子的CPU成本。尽可能避免在大容量系统中使用它们。可以避免使用Affector的一些简单情况是，使用定时的ParticleGroup过渡而不是时间触发的Affector，或者在发射器的加速属性中设置由于重力而产生的加速度，而不是使用Graffity Affector。

trans-unit.source: Affects only Q3DBars. However, in Q3DBars graphs holding both positive and negative values, reflections are not supported for custom items that intersect the floor plane. In that case, reflections should be turned off to avoid incorrect rendering.
trans-unit.target: 仅影响Q3DBars。但是，在同时包含正值和负值的Q3DBars图形中，与地板平面相交的自定义项不支持反射。在这种情况下，应关闭反射以避免错误的渲染。

trans-unit.source: After having created a controller object in the central role, the first step is to establish a connection via connectToDevice(). Once the connection has been established, the controller's state() changes to QLowEnergyController::ConnectedState and the connected() signal is emitted. It is important to mention that some platforms such as a BlueZ based Linux cannot maintain two connected instances of QLowEnergyController to the same remote device. In such cases the second call to connectToDevice() may fail. This limitation may disappear at some stage in the future. The disconnectFromDevice() function is used to break the existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建了中心角色的控制器对象后，第一步是通过connectToDevice（）建立连接。建立连接后，控制器的状态（）更改为QLowEnergyController :: ConnectedState并发出connected（）信号。值得一提的是，某些平台（例如基于BlueZ的Linux）无法将两个QLowEnergyController实例连接到同一远程设备。在这种情况下，对connectToDevice（）的第二次调用可能会失败。此限制可能会在将来的某个阶段消失。与设备断开连接（）函数用于断开现有连接。

trans-unit.source: After having created a controller object in the central role, the first step is to establish a connection via connectToDevice(). Once the connection has been established, the controller's state() changes to QLowEnergyController::ConnectedState and the connected() signal is emitted. It is important to mention that some platforms such as a BlueZ based Linux cannot maintain two connected instances of QLowEnergyController to the same remote device. In such cases the second call to connectToDevice() may fail. This limitation may disappear at some stage in the future. The disconnectFromDevice() function is used to break the existing connection.

After having created a controller object in the peripheral role, the first step is to populate the set of GATT services offered to client devices via calls to addService(). Afterwards, one would call startAdvertising() to let the device broadcast some data and, depending on the type of advertising being done, also listen for incoming connections from GATT clients.
trans-unit.target: 在外围设备角色中创建了控制器对象之后，第一步是填充通过调用addService（）提供给客户端设备的GATT服务集。之后，将调用startAdvertising（）来让设备广播一些数据，并且根据正在做的广告类型，还监听来自GATT客户端的传入连接。

trans-unit.source: After initiating the SSL client handshake, if the identity of the peer can't be established, signal sslErrors() is emitted. If you want to ignore the errors and continue connecting, you must call ignoreSslErrors(), either from inside a slot function connected to the sslErrors() signal, or prior to entering encrypted mode. If ignoreSslErrors() is not called, the connection is dropped, signal disconnected() is emitted, and QSslSocket returns to the UnconnectedState.
trans-unit.target: 启动SSL客户端握手后，如果无法建立对等方的身份，则会发出信号sslErrors（）。如果要忽略错误并继续连接，则必须从连接到sslErrors（）信号的插槽函数内部或进入加密模式之前调用ignoreSslErrors（）。如果ignoreSslErrors（）不被调用，则连接断开，信号断开（）被发射，并且QSslSocket返回到UnconnectedState。

trans-unit.source: After initiating the SSL client handshake, if the identity of the peer can't be established, signal sslErrors() is emitted. If you want to ignore the errors and continue connecting, you must call ignoreSslErrors(), either from inside a slot function connected to the sslErrors() signal, or prior to entering encrypted mode. If ignoreSslErrors() is not called, the connection is dropped, signal disconnected() is emitted, and QSslSocket returns to the UnconnectedState.

trans-unit.source: After setting the model on a view, you typically want to react to user actions, such as an item being clicked. Since a QAbstractItemView provides QModelIndex-based signals and functions, you need a way to obtain the QStandardItem that corresponds to a given QModelIndex, and vice versa. itemFromIndex() and indexFromItem() provide this mapping. Typical usage of itemFromIndex() includes obtaining the item at the current index in a view, and obtaining the item that corresponds to an index carried by a QAbstractItemView signal, such as QAbstractItemView::clicked(). First you connect the view's signal to a slot in your class:

trans-unit.source: Algorithmic Complexity
trans-unit.target: 算法的复杂性

trans-unit.source: Algorithmic complexity attacks
trans-unit.target: 算法复杂性攻击

trans-unit.source: Algorithmic complexity is concerned about how fast (or slow) each function is as the number of items in the container grow. For example, inserting an item in the middle of a QLinkedList is an extremely fast operation, irrespective of the number of items stored in the QLinkedList. On the other hand, inserting an item in the middle of a QVector is potentially very expensive if the QVector contains many items, since half of the items must be moved one position in memory.
trans-unit.target: 算法复杂度与每个功能随着容器中项目数量的增长有多快（或多慢）有关。例如，不管QLinkedList中存储的项目数如何，将项目插入QLinkedList的中间都是非常快速的操作。在另一方面，在中间插入一个项目QVector可能非常昂贵，如果QVector包含很多项目，由于项目的一半必须移动内存中的一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Algorithmic complexity is concerned about how fast (or slow) each function is as the number of items in the container grow. For example, inserting an item in the middle of a QLinkedList is an extremely fast operation, irrespective of the number of items stored in the QLinkedList. On the other hand, inserting an item in the middle of a QVector is potentially very expensive if the QVector contains many items, since half of the items must be moved one position in memory.

trans-unit.source: All QML methods are exposed to the meta-object system and can be called from C++ using QMetaObject::invokeMethod(). You can specify types for the parameters and the return value after the colon character, as shown in the code snippet below. This can be useful, for example, when you want to connect a signal in C++ with a certain signature to a QML-defined method. If you omit the types, the C++ signature will use QVariant.

All QML object types are QObject-derived types, whether they are internally implemented by the engine or defined by third-party sources. This means the QML engine can use the Qt Meta Object System to dynamically instantiate any QML object type and inspect the created objects.

trans-unit.source: All classes that contain signals or slots must mention Q_OBJECT at the top of their declaration. They must also derive (directly or indirectly) from QObject.

trans-unit.source: All classes that inherit from QObject or one of its subclasses (e.g., QWidget) can contain signals and slots. Signals are emitted by objects when they change their state in a way that may be interesting to other objects. This is all the object does to communicate. It does not know or care whether anything is receiving the signals it emits. This is true information encapsulation, and ensures that the object can be used as a software component.
trans-unit.target: 从QObject或其子类之一（例如QWidget）继承的所有类都可以包含信号和插槽。当对象以其他对象可能感兴趣的方式更改其状态时，会发出信号。这就是对象要传达的所有信息。它不知道也不关心是否有任何东西正在接收它发出的信号。这是真正的信息封装，可确保将对象用作软件组件。

All descriptor and characteristic requests towards the same remote device are serialised. A queue is employed when issuing multiple requests at the same time. The queue does not eliminate duplicated read requests for the same characteristic.

trans-unit.source: All descriptor and characteristic requests towards the same remote device are serialised. A queue is employed when issuing multiple write requests at the same time. The queue does not eliminate duplicated write requests for the same descriptor. For example, if the same descriptor is set to the value A and immediately afterwards to B, the two write request are executed in the given order.
trans-unit.target: 向同一远程设备发出的所有描述符和特性请求都是序列化的。当同时发出多个写请求时,会使用一个队列。队列不会消除对同一描述符的重复写请求。例如,如果同一个描述符被设置为A值,紧接着又设置为B值,那么这两个写请求将按照给定的顺序执行。

trans-unit.source: All hash tables are vulnerable to a particular class of denial of service attacks, in which the attacker carefully pre-computes a set of different keys that are going to be hashed in the same bucket of a hash table (or even have the very same hash value). The attack aims at getting the worst-case algorithmic behavior (O(n) instead of amortized O(1), see Algorithmic Complexity for the details) when the data is fed into the table.
trans-unit.target: 所有哈希表都容易受到特定类别的拒绝服务攻击的攻击，在这种拒绝服务攻击中，攻击者会仔细地预先计算将要在哈希表的同一存储桶中哈希的一组不同的密钥（甚至具有完全相同的哈希）值）。攻击旨在将数据馈入表时获得最坏情况的算法行为（用O（n）而不是摊销的O（1），有关详细信息，请参见算法复杂性）。

trans-unit.source: All item models are based on the QAbstractItemModel class. This class defines an interface that is used by views and delegates to access data. trans-unit.source: All items are drawn in a defined, stable order, and this same order decides which items will receive mouse input first when you click on the scene. Normally you don't have to worry about sorting, as the items follow a "natural order", following the logical structure of the scene.

trans-unit.source: All of the getter methods in QUrlQuery support an optional parameter of type QUrl::ComponentFormattingOptions, including query(), which dictate how to encode the data in question. Except for QUrl::FullyDecoded, the returned value must still be considered a percent-encoded string, as there are certain values which cannot be expressed in decoded form (like control characters, byte sequences not decodable to UTF-8). For that reason, the percent character is always represented by the string "%25".
trans-unit.target: QUrlQuery中的所有getter方法都支持类型为QUrl :: ComponentFormattingOptions的可选参数，包括query（），该参数指示如何对有问题的数据进行编码。除了QUrl :: FullyDecoded之外，返回的值仍必须视为百分比编码的字符串，因为某些值无法以解码形式表示（例如控制字符，不可解码为UTF-8的字节序列）。因此，百分号始终由字符串“％25”表示。

For that reason, the percent character is always represented by the string "%25".

trans-unit.source: All position APIs are part of the QtPositioning module. The basic piece of position information is the coordinate. A coordinate encapsulates data for the latitude, longitude and altitude of the location. Altitude is in meters. It also has a method to determine distance to another coordinate. The coordinate type may also be held within a Location element, this will also have information on a bounding box size to determine sufficient proximity to the location and a location address.
trans-unit.target: 所有位置API都是QtPositioning模块的一部分。位置信息的基本要素是坐标。坐标封装了该位置的纬度，经度和海拔高度的数据。高度以米为单位。它还具有确定到另一个坐标的距离的方法。该坐标类型也可以在内部召开地点元素，这也将有一个边框大小的信息来确定足够接近的位置和位置的地址。

trans-unit.source: All readers use the class QXmlInputSource to read the input document. Since you are normally interested in particular content in the XML document, the reader reports the content through special handler classes (QXmlDTDHandler, QXmlDeclHandler, QXmlContentHandler, QXmlEntityResolver, QXmlErrorHandler and QXmlLexicalHandler), which you must subclass, if you want to process the contents.
trans-unit.target: 所有阅读器都使用QXmlInputSource类读取输入文档。由于通常您对XML文档中的特定内容感兴趣，因此读者可以通过特殊的处理程序类（QXmlDTDHandler，QXmlDeclHandler，QXmlContentHandler，QXmlEntityResolver，QXmlErrorHandler和QXmlLexicalHandler）报告内容，如果要处理内容，则必须将其子类化。

trans-unit.source: All rendering happens into an OpenGL framebuffer object. makeCurrent() ensure that it is bound in the context. Keep this in mind when creating and binding additional framebuffer objects in the rendering code in paintGL(). Never re-bind the framebuffer with ID 0. Instead, call defaultFramebufferObject() to get the ID that should be bound.
trans-unit.target: 所有渲染都发生在OpenGL帧缓冲区对象中。makeCurrent（）确保它绑定在上下文中。在paintGL（）中的渲染代码中创建和绑定其他帧缓冲区对象时，请记住这一点。切勿重新绑定ID为0的帧缓冲区。而是调用defaultFramebufferObject（）获取应绑定的ID。

trans-unit.source: All requests are serialised based on First-In First-Out principle. For example, issuing a second write request, before the previous write request has finished, is delayed until the first write request has finished.
trans-unit.target: 所有的请求都是根据先入先出的原则进行序列化。例如,在前一个写请求完成之前,发出第二个写请求,会延迟到第一个写请求完成。

trans-unit.source: All screens reported by the DRM layer will be treated as one big virtual desktop by default. Although not recommended, the virtual desktop mode can be disabled by setting separateScreens to false in the configuration, if desired.

trans-unit.source: All the limitations when using ActiveQt are implied when using this technique to interoperate with .NET, e.g. the datatypes we can use in the APIs can only be those supported by ActiveQt and COM. However, since this includes subclasses of QObject and QWidget we can wrap any of our datatypes into a QObject subclass to make its API available to .NET. This has the positive side effect that the same API is automatically available when using Qt Script to automate Qt applications and to COM clients in general.

All the limitations when using ActiveQt are implied when using this technique to interoperate with .NET, e.g. the datatypes we can use in the APIs can only be those supported by ActiveQt and COM. However, since this includes subclasses of QObject and QWidget we can wrap any of our datatypes into a QObject subclass to make its API available to .NET. This has the positive side effect that the same API is automatically available when using Qt Script to automate Qt applications and to COM clients in general.
trans-unit.target: 使用此技术与.NET互操作时，将隐含使用ActiveQt时的所有限制，例如，我们可以在API中使用的数据类型只能是ActiveQt和COM 支持的数据类型。但是，由于它包括QObject和QWidget的子类，因此我们可以将我们的任何数据类型包装到QObject子类中，以使其API可用于.NET。这具有积极的副作用，即使用Qt脚本自动执行Qt应用程序和通常向COM客户端自动提供相同的API 。

All visual QML items are rendered using the scene graph, the default implementation of which is a low-level, high-performance rendering stack, closely tied to OpenGL. It is possible for subclasses of QQuickItem to add their own custom content into the scene graph by setting the QQuickItem::ItemHasContents flag and reimplementing the QQuickItem::updatePaintNode() function.
trans-unit.target: 所有视觉QML项均使用场景图进行渲染，场景图的默认实现是与OpenGL紧密相关的低级高性能渲染堆栈。通过设置QQuickItem :: ItemHasContents标志并重新实现QQuickItem :: updatePaintNode（）函数，QQuickItem的子类可以将其自己的自定义内容添加到场景图中。

trans-unit.source: All visual QML items are rendered using the scene graph, the default implementation of which is a low-level, high-performance rendering stack, closely tied to OpenGL. It is possible for subclasses of QQuickItem to add their own custom content into the scene graph by setting the QQuickItem::ItemHasContents flag and reimplementing the QQuickItem::updatePaintNode() function.

trans-unit.source: Allow other services to bind to the same address and port. This is useful when multiple processes share the load of a single service by listening to the same address and port (e.g., a web server with several pre-forked listeners can greatly improve response time). However, because any service is allowed to rebind, this option is subject to certain security considerations. Note that by combining this option with ReuseAddressHint, you will also allow your service to rebind an existing shared address. On Unix, this is equivalent to the SO_REUSEADDR socket option. On Windows, this is the default behavior, so this option is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 允许其他服务绑定到同一个地址和端口。当多个进程通过监听相同的地址和端口来分担单个服务的负载时,这个选项很有用(例如,一个web服务器有几个预设的监听器,可以大大改善响应时间)。但是,由于任何服务都允许重新绑定,所以这个选项要考虑一定的安全性。请注意,通过将此选项与 ReuseAddressHint 结合起来,您还将允许您的服务重新绑定一个现有的共享地址。在Unix上,这相当于SO_REUSEADDR socket选项。在Windows上,这是默认的行为,所以这个选项会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Allows locally loaded documents to ignore cross-origin rules so that they can access remote resources that would normally be blocked, because all remote resources are considered cross-origin for a local file. Remote access that would not be blocked by cross-origin rules is still possible when this setting is disabled (default). Note that disabling this setting does not stop XMLHttpRequests or media elements in local files from accessing remote content. Basically, it only stops some HTML subresources, such as scripts, and therefore disabling this setting is not a safety mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 允许本地加载的文件忽略跨源规则,以便它们可以访问通常会被阻止的远程资源,因为对于本地文件来说,所有远程资源都被视为跨源。当禁用此设置(默认)时,仍然可以访问不会被跨源规则阻止的远程资源。请注意,禁用此设置不会阻止本地文件中的XMLHttpRequests或媒体元素访问远程内容。基本上,它只阻止一些HTML子资源,如脚本,因此禁用此设置不是一种安全机制。

trans-unit.target: 允许将触摸事件（请参阅QTouchEvent）发送到小部件。必须在所有可以处理触摸事件的小部件上设置。如果未设置此属性，则来自触摸设备的事件将作为鼠标事件发送。

trans-unit.source: Allows touchpad single touch events to be sent to the widget.
trans-unit.target: 允许将触摸板单次触摸事件发送到小组件。

trans-unit.source: Allows users to specify a non-existing file. If an existing file is selected, the users should be informed that the file is going to be overwritten.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to deform the particle image when drawn. The rectangular image will be deformed so that the horizontal sides are in the shape of this vector instead of (1,0).
trans-unit.target: 允许你在绘制粒子图像时对其进行变形。矩形图像将被变形,使水平边是这个向量的形状,而不是(1,0)。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to deform the particle image when drawn. The rectangular image will be deformed so that the vertical sides are in the shape of this vector instead of (0,1).
trans-unit.target: 允许你在绘制粒子图像时对其进行变形。矩形图像将被变形,使垂直边是这个向量的形状,而不是(0,1)。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set a text validator for an editable ComboBox. When a validator is set, the text field will only accept input which leaves the text property in an intermediate state. The accepted signal will only be sent if the text is in an acceptable state when enter is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 允许您为可编辑的ComboBox设置文本验证器。设置验证器后，文本字段将仅接受使text属性处于中间状态的输入。仅当按下Enter键时文本处于可接受的状态时，才会发送接受的信号。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set a validator on the TextField. When a validator is set, the TextField will only accept input which leaves the text property in an intermediate state. The accepted signal will only be sent if the text is in an acceptable state when enter is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 允许您在TextField上设置验证器。设置验证器后，TextField将仅接受使text属性处于中间状态的输入。仅当按下Enter键时文本处于可接受的状态时，才会发送接受的信号。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set a validator on the TextInput. When a validator is set the TextInput will only accept input which leaves the text property in an acceptable or intermediate state. The accepted signal will only be sent if the text is in an acceptable state when enter is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 允许您在TextInput上设置验证器。设置验证器后，TextInput将仅接受使text属性处于可接受或中间状态的输入。仅当按下Enter键时文本处于可接受的状态时，才会发送接受的信号。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set an input mask on the TextInput, restricting the allowable text inputs. See QLineEdit::inputMask for further details, as the exact same mask strings are used by TextInput.

Also, an item using a layer can not be batched during rendering. This means that a scene with many layered items may have performance problems.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在渲染过程中无法批处理使用图层的项目。这意味着具有许多分层项目的场景可能会出现性能问题。

trans-unit.source: Also, anchor-based layouts cannot be mixed with absolute positioning. If an item specifies its x position and also sets anchors.left, or anchors its left and right edges but additionally sets a width, the result is undefined, as it would not be clear whether the item should use anchoring or absolute positioning. The same can be said for setting an item's y and height with anchors.top and anchors.bottom, or setting anchors.fill as well as width or height. The same applies when using positioners such as Row and Grid, which may set the item's x and y properties. If you wish to change from using anchor-based to absolute positioning, you can clear an anchor value by setting it to undefined.
trans-unit.target: 同样，基于锚的布局不能与绝对定位混合使用。如果一个项目指定了它的x位置，并且还设置了anchors.left，或者锚定了它的左右边缘，但又设置了width，那么结果是不确定的，因为不清楚该项目是应该使用锚定还是绝对定位。对于使用anchors.top和anchors.bottom设置项目的y和高度，或者设置anchors.fill以及width或height来说，也是如此。使用定位器（如“行”和“网格”）时也是如此，这可能会设置项目的x和y属性。如果希望从使用基于锚的位置更改为绝对定位，可以通过将锚值设置为 undefined 来清除锚值。

trans-unit.source: Also, any property declared with Q_PROPERTY will be automatically exposed over the Properties interface on D-Bus. Since the QObject property system does not allow for non-readable properties, it is not possible to declare write-only properties using adaptors.

trans-unit.source: Although QLocalServer is designed for use with an event loop, it's possible to use it without one. In that case, you must use waitForNewConnection(), which blocks until either a connection is available or a timeout expires.

trans-unit.source: Although QLocalSocket is designed for use with an event loop, it's possible to use it without one. In that case, you must use waitForConnected(), waitForReadyRead(), waitForBytesWritten(), and waitForDisconnected() which blocks until the operation is complete or the timeout expires.
trans-unit.target: 尽管QLocalSocket设计用于事件循环，但也可以不使用事件循环。在这种情况下，您必须使用waitForConnected（），waitForReadyRead（），waitForBytesWritten（）和waitForDisconnected（），它们会阻塞直到操作完成或超时到期。

trans-unit.source: Although QObject is reentrant, the GUI classes, notably QWidget and all its subclasses, are not reentrant. They can only be used from the main thread. As noted earlier, QCoreApplication::exec() must also be called from that thread.
trans-unit.target: 尽管QObject是可重入的，但GUI类（尤其是QWidget及其所有子类）不是可重入的。它们只能在主线程中使用。如前所述，还必须从该线程中调用QCoreApplication :: exec（）。

trans-unit.source: Although QPrinter objects can be constructed and set up without requiring user input, printing is often performed as a result of a request by the user; for example, when the user selects the File|Print... menu item in a GUI application. In such cases, a newly-constructed QPrinter object is supplied to a QPrintDialog, allowing the user to specify the printer to use, paper size, and other printing properties.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以在不需要用户输入的情况下构造和设置QPrinter对象，但是通常会根据用户的请求执行打印；例如，当用户在GUI应用程序中选择File | Print ...菜单项时。在这种情况下，会将新构造的QPrinter对象提供给QPrintDialog，从而允许用户指定要使用的打印机，纸张尺寸和其他打印属性。

Although QLocalServer is designed for use with an event loop, it's possible to use it without one. In that case, you must use waitForNewConnection(), which blocks until either a connection is available or a timeout expires.

Although QLocalSocket is designed for use with an event loop, it's possible to use it without one. In that case, you must use waitForConnected(), waitForReadyRead(), waitForBytesWritten(), and waitForDisconnected() which blocks until the operation is complete or the timeout expires.

Although QTcpServer is mostly designed for use with an event loop, it's possible to use it without one. In that case, you must use waitForNewConnection(), which blocks until either a connection is available or a timeout expires.

trans-unit.source: Although command compression and macros appear to have the same effect to the user, they often have different uses in an application. Commands that perform small changes to a document may be usefully compressed if there is no need to individually record them, and if only larger changes are relevant to the user. However, for commands that need to be recorded individually, or those that cannot be compressed, it is useful to use macros to provide a more convenient user experience while maintaining a record of each command.
trans-unit.target: 虽然对用户来说,命令压缩和宏似乎具有相同的效果,但它们在应用程序中往往有不同的用途。如果不需要单独记录对文档进行小改动的命令,而且只有较大的改动与用户有关,那么对这些命令进行压缩可能是有用的。但是,对于需要单独记录的命令,或者不能压缩的命令,使用宏来提供更方便的用户体验,同时保持每条命令的记录是有用的。

trans-unit.source: Although it seems appropriate to perform sorting and filtering operations as internal functions of views, this approach does not allow multiple views to share the results of such potentially costly operations. The alternative approach, involving sorting within the model itself, leads to the similar problem where each view has to display items of data that are organized according to the most recent processing operation.
trans-unit.target: 虽然将排序和过滤操作作为视图的内部功能来执行似乎是合适的,但这种方法不允许多个视图共享这种可能代价高昂的操作的结果。另一种方法是在模型本身内部进行排序,这导致了类似的问题,即每个视图必须显示根据最近的处理操作组织的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Although keys from all four locations are available for reading, only the first file (the user-specific location for the application at hand) is accessible for writing. To write to any of the other files, omit the application name and/or specify QSettings::SystemScope (as opposed to QSettings::UserScope, the default).
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以从所有四个位置读取密钥，但是只能访问第一个文件（应用程序的用户特定位置）进行写入。要写入任何其他文件，请省略应用程序名称和/或指定QSettings :: SystemScope（与默认设置QSettings :: UserScope相对）。

trans-unit.source: Although models and views should respond to these hints in appropriate ways, custom components may ignore any or all of them if they are not relevant.
trans-unit.target: 虽然模型和视图应该以适当的方式响应这些提示,但如果它们不相关,自定义组件可能会忽略其中的任何或所有提示。

trans-unit.source: Although most of its functions work asynchronously, it's possible to use QTcpSocket synchronously (i.e., blocking). To get blocking behavior, call QTcpSocket's waitFor...() functions; these suspend the calling thread until a signal has been emitted. For example, after calling the non-blocking QTcpSocket::connectToHost() function, call QTcpSocket::waitForConnected() to block the thread until the connected() signal has been emitted.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它的大多数功能都是异步工作的，但也可以同步使用QTcpSocket（即阻塞）。要获得阻塞行为，请调用QTcpSocket的waitFor ...（）函数；它们挂起调用线程，直到发出信号为止。例如，调用非阻塞QTcpSocket :: connectToHost（）函数后，调用QTcpSocket :: waitForConnected（）阻塞线程，直到发出connect （）信号为止。

trans-unit.source: Although qdoc will use the encoding to read source and documentation files, limitations of C++ compilers may prevent you from using non-ASCII characters in source code comments. In cases like these, it is possible to write API documentation completely in documentation files.
trans-unit.target: 虽然qdoc会使用编码来读取源文件和文档文件,但C++编译器的限制可能会阻止你在源代码注释中使用非ASCII字符。在这样的情况下,可以将API文档完全写在文档文件中。

trans-unit.source: Although shading is not supported by all styles, this function will still show the subwindow as shaded, regardless of whether support for shading is available. However, when used with styles without shading support, the user will be unable to return from shaded mode through the user interface (e.g., through a shade button in the title bar).
trans-unit.target: 尽管并非所有样式都支持阴影,但无论是否支持阴影,此功能仍会将子窗口显示为阴影。但是,当与不支持阴影的样式一起使用时,用户将无法通过用户界面(例如,通过标题栏中的阴影按钮)从阴影模式返回。

trans-unit.source: Although some developers might resort to fully specifying all the modifiers they use on their keyboards to activate a shortcut, this will also result in unexpected behavior for users of different keyboard layouts.
trans-unit.target: 虽然一些开发人员可能会采用完全指定他们在键盘上使用的所有修饰符来激活快捷键,但这也会导致不同键盘布局的用户出现意外行为。

trans-unit.source: Although some platforms may differ the socket must generally be connected to guarantee the return of a valid address. In particular, this is true when dealing with platforms that support multiple local Bluetooth adapters.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有些平台可能有所不同,但一般情况下必须连接套接字以保证返回有效地址。尤其是在处理支持多个本地蓝牙适配器的平台时,更是如此。

trans-unit.source: Although some platforms may differ the socket must generally be connected to guarantee the return of a valid name. In particular, this is true when dealing with platforms that support multiple local Bluetooth adapters.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有些平台可能有所不同,但一般情况下必须连接套接字,以保证返回一个有效的名称。尤其是在处理支持多个本地蓝牙适配器的平台时,更是如此。

trans-unit.source: Although the size() is 5, the byte array also maintains an extra '\0' character at the end so that if a function is used that asks for a pointer to the underlying data (e.g. a call to data()), the data pointed to is guaranteed to be '\0'-terminated.
trans-unit.target: 尽管size（）为5，但字节数组的末尾还保留了一个额外的'\ 0'字符，因此，如果使用的函数要求指向基础数据的指针（例如，对data（）的调用），指向的数据保证以'\ 0'结尾。

trans-unit.source: Although the XQuery language was designed for querying XML, with Qt XML Patterns one can use XQuery for querying any data that can be modeled to look like XML. Non-XML data is modeled to look like XML by loading it into a custom subclass of QAbstractXmlNodeModel, where it is then presented to the Qt XML Patterns XQuery engine via the same API the XQuery engine uses for querying XML.

Although the C++ classes provide complete feature sets to operate on SQL data, they do not provide data access to QML. So you must implement a C++ custom data model as a subclass of one of these classes, and expose it to QML either as a type or context property.
trans-unit.target: 虽然C++类提供了完整的功能集来操作SQL数据,但它们并不提供对QML的数据访问。所以你必须实现一个C++自定义数据模型作为这些类中的一个子类,并将其作为类型或上下文属性暴露给QML。

trans-unit.source: Although the Canvas item provides an HTML5-like API, HTML5 canvas applications need to be modified to run in the Canvas item:
trans-unit.target: 虽然Canvas项提供了类似HTML5的API,但HTML5画布应用需要修改后才能在Canvas项中运行。

trans-unit.source: Although the XQuery language was designed for querying XML, with Qt XML Patterns one can use XQuery for querying any data that can be modeled to look like XML. Non-XML data is modeled to look like XML by loading it into a custom subclass of QAbstractXmlNodeModel, where it is then presented to the Qt XML Patterns XQuery engine via the same API the XQuery engine uses for querying XML.
trans-unit.target: 尽管XQuery语言是为查询XML而设计的，但是使用Qt XML Patterns可以使用XQuery查询可以建模为XML的任何数据。通过将非XML数据加载到QAbstractXmlNodeModel的自定义子类中，将其建模为看起来像XML，然后通过XQuery引擎用于查询XML的相同API将其呈现给Qt XML Patterns XQuery引擎。

trans-unit.source: Although the current picture formats supported by Qt ignore the parameters string, it may be used in future extensions or by contributions (for example, JPEG).
trans-unit.target: 虽然目前Qt支持的图片格式忽略了这个参数字符串,但它可能会在未来的扩展或贡献中被使用(例如JPEG)。

trans-unit.source: Although the declaration in the previous section makes the type available for use in direct signal-slot connections, it cannot be used for queued signal-slot connections, such as those that are made between objects in different threads. This is because the meta-object system does not know how to handle creation and destruction of objects of the custom type at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 虽然上一节的声明使得该类型可用于直接的信号槽连接,但它不能用于排队的信号槽连接,例如不同线程的对象之间的连接。这是因为元对象系统不知道如何在运行时处理自定义类型对象的创建和销毁。

trans-unit.source: Although the declaration order of the FrameGraph is important, Qt 3D is able to process each RenderView in parallel as each RenderView is independent of the others for the purposes of generating a set of RenderCommands to be submitted whilst the RenderView's state is in effect.
trans-unit.target: 虽然FrameGraph的声明顺序很重要,但Qt 3D能够并行处理每个RenderView,因为每个RenderView是独立于其他RenderView的,目的是在RenderView的状态生效时生成一组RenderCommands提交。

trans-unit.source: Although the example uses QXmlQuery to produce the sequence of callbacks to functions in QAbstractXmlReceiver, you can call the callback functions directly as long as your sequence of calls represents a valid XQuery sequence.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该示例使用QXmlQuery生成QAbstractXmlReceiver中的函数的回调序列，但是只要您的调用序列表示有效的XQuery序列，就可以直接调用回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Although the example uses QXmlQuery to produce the sequence of callbacks to functions in QAbstractXmlReceiver, you can call the callback functions directly as long as your sequence of calls represents a valid XQuery sequence.
Although the item's shape can be arbitrary, the bounding rect is always rectangular, and it is unaffected by the items' transformation.
trans-unit.target: 虽然物品的形状可以是任意的,但边界矩形总是矩形的,它不受物品的变换影响。

trans-unit.source: Although the previous example would work, it is not optimal. Real world incubation controllers should try and maximize the amount of idle time they consume - rather than a static amount like 5 milliseconds - while not disturbing the application.
trans-unit.target: 虽然前面的例子可以工作,但它不是最佳的。现实世界中的孵化控制器应该在不干扰应用的情况下,尽量增加它们所消耗的空闲时间--而不是5毫秒这样的静态量。

trans-unit.source: Although we do not need to handle the conversion between logical and physical coordinates ourselves, we still need to apply transformations to painting operations because the pixel measurements used to draw on screen are often too small for the higher resolutions of typical printers.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我们不需要自己处理逻辑坐标和物理坐标之间的转换,但我们仍然需要在绘画操作中应用转换,因为用于在屏幕上绘画的像素测量值往往太小,无法满足典型打印机的较高分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Always refer to the same key using the same case. For example, if you refer to a key as "text fonts" in one place in your code, don't refer to it as "Text Fonts" somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: 始终使用相同的大小写来引用同一个键。例如,如果你在代码中的某个地方把一个键称为 "文本字体",不要在其他地方把它称为 "文本字体"。
